author: Times Of India
title: Aviation ministry HQ sealed as worker tests +ve
description: An aviation ministry employee has tested Covid-19 positive and the HQ building where he works, Rajiv Gandhi Bhavan, has been sealed for 3 days as per protocol for being disinfected. This is the first confirmed case of a central government ministry employee ge…
content:
